item.title: Israel Palestine
item.description: Overview Jews lived in the Israel area in the 1st Century but it was taken over by the Roman Empire In 1916 the Jewish population in Palestine was 3% Britain made the [[#Balfour Declaration-1917]] which led to Jews immigrating to Palestine The League of nations mandate was a part of the Treaty of Versailles that gave the territory that Germany and the Ottoman Empire conquered to other nations after they lost the war.
